text: @realDonaldTrump Not going for any vaccine from depopulation fanatic Bill Gates or his Globalist buddies in WHO & CDC. If it's any good, those who get the vaccine won't have to worry about catching COVID-19 from anyone. I'll stick with raw garlic, thank you.
